attributes.action: Allow 16 year olds to have a say in the general elections.
attributes.additional_details:
I understand people may believe that 16 is too young to vote and have a say and we "aren't educated" but this goes for may above 20 and if not 30. Its who you are not what your date of birth is.

Why should I find Brexit through my taxes I pay when I work when I didn't actually get a say if I wanted it to happen unlike everyone else.

Especially as this will effect my generation the most.
attributes.background:
We are always voting for something which will eventually effect our future in the UK. I.e Brexit.

As being younger we will suffer the effects the longest in the UK.

I am 16 and pay tax and NI to contribute to these political parties so why cant I have my say too
